cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuuka

sentence.kanji: 次の駅は通過します。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no eki ha tsuuka shimasu
sentence.english: This train will not stop at the next station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youfuku

sentence.kanji: 今日は洋服を買いに行きます。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha youfuku wo kai ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to buy some clothes today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's abunai

sentence.kanji: その道は車が多くて危ない。
sentence.romaji: sono michi ha kuruma ga ookute abunai
sentence.english: There are many cars on that road, so it's dangerous.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuujou

sentence.kanji: 通常は夜8時まで営業しています。
sentence.romaji: tsuujou ha yoru hachiji made eigyou shite imasu
sentence.english: We're usually open until eight o'clock at night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meirei

sentence.kanji: 彼女は命令に従わなかった。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha meirei ni shitagawanakata
sentence.english: She did not obey orders.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hieru

sentence.kanji: クーラーで体が冷えた。
sentence.romaji: ku-ra- de karada ga hieta
sentence.english: The air conditioner's given me the chills.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiyasu

sentence.kanji: 頭を冷やしなさい。
sentence.romaji: atama wo hiyashinasai
sentence.english: Cool your head.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sameru

sentence.kanji: 彼への気持ちが冷めた。
sentence.romaji: kare he no kimochi ga sameta
sentence.english: My feelings for him have died down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reizouko

sentence.kanji: 飲み物は冷蔵庫にあります。
sentence.romaji: nomimono ha reizouko ni arimasu
sentence.english: Drinks are in the refrigerator.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reibou

sentence.kanji: 冷房を入れてください。
sentence.romaji: reibou wo irete kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn on the air-conditioner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boueki

sentence.kanji: 父は貿易の仕事をしています。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha boueki no shigoto wo shite imasu
sentence.english: My father works in the trading business.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryuugaku

sentence.kanji: 1年間、アメリカに留学しました。
sentence.romaji: ichinenkan amerika ni ryuugaku shimashita
sentence.english: I went to study in the United States for a year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teiryuujo

sentence.kanji: バスの停留所で10分待ちました。
sentence.romaji: basu no teiryuujo de jupun machimashita
sentence.english: I waited for ten minutes at the bus stop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakitome

sentence.kanji: これを書留で送りたいのですが。
sentence.romaji: kore wo kakitome de okuritai no desu ga
sentence.english: I want to send this by registered mail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rusu

sentence.kanji: 父は今、留守です。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha ima rusu desu
sentence.english: My father isn't at home now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutsuujiko

sentence.kanji: 彼は交通事故を起こした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koutsuujiko wo okoshita
sentence.english: He caused a traffic accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daitouryou

sentence.kanji: フランスの大統領は誰ですか。
sentence.romaji: furansu no daitouryou ha dare desu ka
sentence.english: Who's the president of France?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tamago

sentence.kanji: ニワトリは卵を産みます。
sentence.romaji: niwatori ha tamago wo umimasu
sentence.english: Chickens lay eggs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's udedokei

sentence.kanji: 私の腕時計は遅れている。
sentence.romaji: watashi no udedokei ha okurete iru
sentence.english: My watch is slow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rei

sentence.kanji: 今ちょうど零時です。
sentence.romaji: ima choudo reiji desu
sentence.english: It's exactly midnight now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odoru

sentence.kanji: 彼女はクラブで踊るのが好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kurabu de odoru no ga suki desu
sentence.english: She likes to dance at the club.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odori

sentence.kanji: この踊りは易しいですよ。
sentence.romaji: kono odori ha yasashii desu yo
sentence.english: This dance is easy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitooshi

sentence.kanji: 仕事の見通しがたたない。
sentence.romaji: shigoto no mitooshi ga tatanai
sentence.english: There's no end in sight to my work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuukou

sentence.kanji: この道は通行できません。
sentence.romaji: kono michi ha tsuukou dekimasen
sentence.english: This is an impassable road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuukoudome

sentence.kanji: あの道路は通行止めだそうです。
sentence.romaji: ano douro ha tsuukoudome da sou desu
sentence.english: I hear that that road is closed to traffic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuujiru

sentence.kanji: その国では英語は通じますか。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni de ha eigo ha tsuujimasu ka
sentence.english: Do they speak English in that country?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutsuu

sentence.kanji: ここは交通の便がよいですね。
sentence.romaji: koko ha koutsuu no ben ga yoi desu ne
sentence.english: This place is conveniently located.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oodoori

sentence.kanji: 大通りでパレードが始まるよ。
sentence.romaji: oodoori de pare-do ga hajimaru yo
sentence.english: The parade starts in the main street.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokutsuu

sentence.kanji: これは私の直通の電話番号です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha watashi no chokutsuu no denwa bangou desu 。
sentence.english: This is my direct telephone number.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seifuku

sentence.kanji: 私の学校には制服がありません。
sentence.romaji: watashi no gakou ni ha seifuku ga arimasen
sentence.english: There is no uniform in my school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wafuku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は和服がよく似合う。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha wafuku ga yoku niau
sentence.english: Traditional Japanese clothes suit her well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuushin

sentence.kanji: 通信教育はとても便利です。
sentence.romaji: tsuushin kyouiku ha totemo benri desu
sentence.english: Distance learning is very convenient.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toorisugiru

sentence.kanji: うっかり目的地を通り過ぎた。
sentence.romaji: ukari mokutekichi wo toorisugita
sentence.english: I inadvertently missed my destination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seigyo

sentence.kanji: ここのパネルで機械全体を制御できます。
sentence.romaji: koko no paneru de kikai zentai wo seigyo dekimasu
sentence.english: The entire machine can be controlled with the panel here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitotoori

sentence.kanji: 説明書を一通り読んだの。
sentence.romaji: setsumeisho wo hitotoori yonda no
sentence.english: I glanced over the manual.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inochi

sentence.kanji: 命より大切なものは無いよ。
sentence.romaji: inochi yori taisetsu na mono ha nai yo
sentence.english: There is nothing more important than life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は大きな過ちを犯している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ooki na ayamachi wo okashite iru
sentence.english: He is making a big mistake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hannin

sentence.kanji: あいつが犯人です。
sentence.romaji: aitsu ga hannin desu
sentence.english: That guy's the criminal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryuutsuu

sentence.kanji: 今日は流通の仕組みを勉強しましょう。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ryuutsuu no shikumi wo benkyou shimashou
sentence.english: Let's study the distribution mechanism today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samasu

sentence.kanji: お茶がとても熱かったので冷ましてから飲んだの。
sentence.romaji: ocha ga totemo atsukata no de samashite kara nonda no
sentence.english: As the tea was very hot, I let it cool and then drank it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiekomu

sentence.kanji: 明日から急に冷え込むそうです。
sentence.romaji: asu kara kyuu ni hiekomu sou desu
sentence.english: I hear it will suddenly get cold from tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiyakasu

sentence.kanji: 友達はそのカップルを冷やかしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ha sono kapuru wo hiyakashita n da
sentence.english: My friend teased the couple.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reitou

sentence.kanji: 残ったカレーを冷凍しました。
sentence.romaji: nokota kare- wo reitou shimashita
sentence.english: I froze the left-over curry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futsuu

sentence.kanji: 今朝、停電で電車が不通になったよ。
sentence.romaji: kesa teiden de densha ga futsuu ni nata yo
sentence.english: The train stopped because of a power failure this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoudo

sentence.kanji: ここから先は隣の国の領土です。
sentence.romaji: koko kara saki ha tonari no kuni no ryoudo desu
sentence.english: From here onwards is the territory of the neighboring country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atena

sentence.kanji: 手紙に宛名を書き込んだよ。
sentence.romaji: tegami ni atena wo kakikonda yo
sentence.english: I filled in the name of the addressee on the letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atesaki

sentence.kanji: 宛先不明で手紙が戻ってきたの。
sentence.romaji: atesaki fumei de tegami ga modote kita no
sentence.english: The letter was returned as the addressee was unknown.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuuro

sentence.kanji: 通路の右側にトイレがありますよ。
sentence.romaji: tsuuro no migigawa ni toire ga arimasu yo
sentence.english: There's a restroom on the right side of the corridor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuuchi

sentence.kanji: 明日、詳細を通知します。
sentence.romaji: asu、 shousai wo tsuuchi shimasu
sentence.english: I'll notify you of the details tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuuyaku

sentence.kanji: 私は通訳です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tsuuyaku desu
sentence.english: I'm an interpreter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shirushi

sentence.kanji: 間違いに印を付けておきました。
sentence.romaji: machigai ni shirushi wo tsukete okimashita
sentence.english: I marked the mistakes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unmei

sentence.kanji: 運命には逆らえないよ。
sentence.romaji: unmei ni ha sakaraenai yo
sentence.english: You can't go against fate.
